name: Academy Escape: The Quest for Knowledge
name_original: Academy Escape: The Quest for Knowledge
description:
This game is made for Google Game and App Academy Gamejam in 48 hours with a team of 5 people.

You can use WASD to move, Mouse to aim and Space to shoot. 

You need to collect all 3 books in order to win.

There are 5 types of enemies:
Angry - Runs faster than normal. Makes your screen wiggly.

Deppressive - Makes you lose more energy than normal.

Stressful - Inverts your movement keys.

Sleepy - Runs slower than normal. Makes you lose your speed.

Unhappy - Lowers your rate of fire.
